thread.title: Peter Andre: Strictly Come Dancing 2015 contestant
thread.title_full: Peter Andre: Strictly Come Dancing 2015 contestant - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Peter Andre: Strictly Come Dancing 2015 contestant
text: The singer and reality TV star Peter Andre had two hit singles in the Nineties with Mysterious Girl and Flava, and became a popular contestant on the third series of I'm A Celebrity....Get Me Out of Here! where he also met his now ex-wife, the author Katie Price. Andre is the bookie's early favourite to win the show and said that he was happy to be a contestant at last. Week one Dance: Cha cha cha Scores: Craig: 7 - Darcey: 8 - Len: 8 - Bruno: 7. TOTAL: 30 Peter and Janette wowed the audience and judges with their showstopping routine to Ain’t No Other Man by Christina Aguilera. Their high-energy moves placed them top of the leader board with 30 points and was declared the best dance of the competition so far. Bruno said he "loved the performance" but wanted to see "more smooth hip action" and told him to "get some fire in the loins". The build-up “Strictly Come Dancing is an incredible show. I’ve always loved watching it on TV and to be honest I’m flattered to have been asked to take part before, but due to certain work commitments was unable to," he said. "I now feel the time is right to give it a go. Everything has just clicked into place to do it this year. Wish me luck!” • Strictly Come Dancing 2015: contestant line-up On being the bookies' favourite: "You can't stuff up once, that's what's scary… Even if you're good at one style of dancing, you can't have your thumbs up, you've got to have your chest out, you've got to have your shoulders back, this is a different world for everybody." On Simon Cowell: "Oh he loves us really, doesn't he, old Simon, he loves us." Peter's partner, Janette Manrara, has been dancing professionally on Strictly Come Dancing since 2013, and is engaged to fellow Strictle professional, Aljaž Skorjanec. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
